title: Deployment - Replace Aging Network Switch
description: A project involves replacing an old, out-of-warranty network switch with a new one during a weekend maintenance window.

tasks.description: Back up the configuration of the old switch.
Translate and apply the configuration to the new switch.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new switch is configured with all the necessary VLANs, ports, and settings.

tasks.description: During the maintenance window, physically swap the old switch with the new one and test connectivity.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new switch is online and network functionality is restored.
